name: CreateReplenishmentProposal
description:
Creates a new `ReplenishmentProposal`.

The new proposal is picked up and processed asynchronously and could take a while after creation to complete generating its results, depending on the
amount of sources, targets, products and the algorithm used. Check the `Status` property in the `GetReplenishmentProposal` response to see if it's
completed.

To allow selecting the output types for the generated proposal, the property `OutputTypes` can be set. It is a flags enum of the type
`ReplenishmentOutputTypes`. If the `OutputTypes` is not set, it will fall back to the setting `Replenishment:Outputs`.

properties.name: OutputTypes
properties.description: Optional parameter to override the standard output types for created replenishment proposals

properties.name: StockLabels
properties.description: Optional list of stock labels to generate replenishment proposal for

properties.name: SequenceID
properties.description: Ordering of the labels, to determine priority in scarcity

properties.name: Code
properties.description: A unique ID identifying this error.

properties.name: Message
properties.description: A human-readable message describing the error.

properties.name: RequestID
properties.description: A unique ID identifying the request. Please provide this ID when contacting support.

properties.name: Type
properties.description: A short description of the error type.

properties.name: ExternalIDs
properties.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the resolved external IDs.

properties.name: IsAsyncResultAvailable
properties.description: This is a flag indicating whether the async request is done. If it is `null`, it is not an async service. If it is `false`, the response is not yet available. Do not process the properties in that case. It is is `true` the properties are filled with the result of the call.

properties.name: UnresolvedExternalIDs
properties.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the external IDs we couldn't resolve.
